metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1974 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: kernel: use-after-free caused by improper check device_is_registered() in nfc netlink related functions Duoming Zhou discovered a race condition in the NFC subsystem in the Linux kernel, leading to a use-after-free vulnerability. A privileged local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

notes.Note: sbeattie> requires CAP_NET_ADMIN in the init namespace.
